title: Khloe Kardashian branded a 'lunatic' in clash with pals on holiday with Kourtney

Khloe Kardashian has been branded a "lunatic" and a "psycho" in an epic showdown with pals on holiday with her sister Kourtney.

The siblings jetted off for a sunshine break in Turks and Caicos earleirt his year, and the trip is shown in the new series of Keeping Up With The Kardashians.

In the next episode, Khloe are Kourtney are seen jumping off a boat into the sea before the actions moves to a night time party.

The sisters are with a group of pals including Larsa Pippen, the Haqq twins, and Steph Shep, and Khloe is shown pushing one of the women into a swimming pool.

The next scene shows Khloe arguing with the group.

She's heard yelling: "Do you have a problem? If you do just say it."

Another woman then snaps back: "'You're acting like a lunatic coming in here like a psycho."

However, the drama is short-lived as Khloe smiles and says: "This is exactly what a good girls' trip should be."

(Image: E!)

(Image: E!)

It comes after Khloe opened up about her love life, admitting she doesn't feel ready to date again after the break-down of her relationship with Tristan Thomas.

Appearing on Jay Shetty's On Purpose podcast, Khloe opened up about her private life in detail.

She said: About eight months ago, I had a breakup and so figuring out, I think people are so good at distracting and I've really chosen to not distract myself or try to not distract myself.

"Maybe people can say True would be a distraction, but if anything, she's a healthy distraction."

She added: "I haven't jumped into dating. I don't care to date right now. I'm not in a rush for it," she continued. "I feel so good in my life and I don't really need much else."

Tristan is the father of Khloe's young daughter True.

(Image: E!)

(Image: E!)

She explained that holding on to anger against Tristan, who cheated twice while she was pregnant, would only hurt her.

"I don't think he's a bad person, I think we all make mistakes, we're humans", she added.

Earlier this year, it emerged Tristan had kissed her sister Kylie 's BFF Jordyn, 22, at a house party.

The scandal sent shockwaves through the family and caused one of the biggest fallouts in reality TV history.
